mapper.select:
SELECT P.PRODNO, P.PRODDESCRIPT, P.PRODCOUNT, P.REVCOUNT,P.PRODDETAILNAME, PC.PRODCATNO, PC.PRDCATNAME, PP.PRDONO, PP.PRODREGDATE, PP.PRODPRICE, PI.PRODIMGNO, PI.PRODNO, PI.PRODIMGPATH FROM PRODUCT P LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODIMAGE PI ON P.PRODNO = PI.PRODNO LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODPRICE PP ON P.PRODNO = PP.PRDONO LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODATEGORY PC ON P.PRODCATNO = PC.PRODCATNO
ORDER BY P.PRODNO DESC
